CH: 我是一位熱愛創作同時又樂於分享，能獨立也喜歡協作，技能樹有點廣的工業設計師。擅長模組化與機構設計。最近專注於程式設計領域，網站、網頁應用、桌面應用、Bot開發。同時經營著Youtube頻道與一個以技術交流為主的Discord伺服器。
EN: I'm love to create things and share, able to independently also can collaboratively, skills tree a little bit widely an industrial designer. Good at Modular & Mechanism Design. Recently focus on programming, website、web applicatiopn、desktop application、bot develop. Also manage a youtube channel and a disocrd server which is focus on technological exchange.
